actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from gross income $500 of interest on savings in the case of an individual taxpayer.
short_title: Federal Buildings Solar Energy Systems Act of 1979

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income up to $500 of the interest earned on a savings account.

titles.title: Federal Buildings Solar Energy Systems Act of 1979
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from gross income $500 of interest on savings in the case of an individual taxpayer.
